underlying_goal: To correct factual errors and align a presentation slide deck with a separate specification document.
primary_success: Correctly interpreted and executed multiple distinct corrections on the slides, including a text replacement, a qualification of results, and aligning a section with an external specification file.
brief_summary: The user provided several corrections for the Week 20 slides, including a name change (UKAC to UK AISI), a qualification of the USACO results, and an inconsistency with a spec file. Claude understood and applied all fixes, updating the slides to reflect the correct information and plan. The task was a straightforward and successful bug-fixing session.
